import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Logo } from '../../shared/images' import { ROUTE_PATHS } from '../../shared/constants/route-paths' import { navbarLiterals } from '../../shared/constants/navbar-literals' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' const Navbar = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const state = useSelector(state => state) console.log('state -->', state) const [isSearchBoxVisible, setIsSearchBoxVisible] = useState(false) const onSearchBoxPress = () => { setIsSearchBoxVisible(!isSearchBoxVisible) } return (

{navbarLiterals.WRITE['en']}

{navbarLiterals.SIGN_IN['en']} {navbarLiterals.SIGN_UP['en']}
) } export default Navbar
